department: Department of Public Works and Government Services
short_summary: Rental Service of Heavy Equipment Graders (Earth Movers)
description: The Department of National Defence, 5 CDSB Gagetown is looking to rent (2) heavy equipment graders without operators from May 01, 2024 to November 30, 2024.
duration_in_months: Institute of Trading and Finance - Duration is not provided
full_summary:
================================ミcho overload-markdown

**Tender Notice**
---------------

### Synopsis

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) invites bids for the rental of two (2) heavy equipment graders without operators from May 1, 2024 to November 30, 2024.

### Solicitation Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4326757948-Doc4392040880
* **Amendment Number:** 2
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4326757948
* **Publication Date:** January 12, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 8, 2024, 14:00 (AST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 10, 2024

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Specifications and Requirements

The successful bidder will be required to provide two (2) heavy equipment graders without operators, with the following specifications:

* UNSPSC codes: 22101500 - Earth moving machinery
* 25102100 - Truck tractors

### Evaluation Criteria

The selection criterion for this procurement is Lowest Price.

### Contact Information

* **Procurement Authority:**
	+ Department of National Defence (DND)
	+ 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Authority Contact:**
	+ Maryse Cyr, SPAC/PSPC
	+ maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information

A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who bid on the previous solicitation. The notice URL is available at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18500659?extsite=MTg1MDA2NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18500659?extsite=MTg1MDA2NTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==).
